content.detailedDescription:
1) i had opened my back sliding glass door to let my dog go out into the back yard, that's when i noticed the object.

 our house is situated on a hillside, and we have a partial mountain view of the opposite side of a small valley. 

 2) the object was huge, (estimated 1000' high x 500' wide), rectangular, square corners, and bright neon  green in color. 

it resembled a rectangular neon green sheet of light coming down from the sky to the ground.

 the object came straight down at a high rate of speed from a very high altitude in the sky , and landed on the side of a large hill, about 4 miles from my location.

i estimate the time of the decent of the object, (sky to ground), to be approximately 3 seconds.

 when the object came just above to the hill side ground it stopped and the bottom area  of the "rectangle" instantly turned into an upside down "v" shape. 

the upside down "v" shape changed in color into  multi colored vertical stripes of red, yellow and purple on each side, and then the entire object just disappeared, leaving 2 bright white illuminated orbs.

i immediately drove my car to a location, off of the side of highway  us395 about one third of a mile from the location of the orbs on the hillside, so that i could better observe the now 2 objects moving on the side of the mountain.

i carry a pair of binoculars in the trunk of my car, and used them to observe the orbs.


the two white orbs were then moving along the ground of the hillside at a high rate of speed.

the orbs moved in a sporadic pattern covering the entire hillside for about 10 minutes.

 i would estimate the speed of movement of the orbs to be about 100 miles per hour.

 i don't think the orbs were actually in contact with the surface of the ground of the hill side, but i think that the orbs were actually hovering very close to the ground, as their was no visible dust coming up from the ground.

after about 10 minutes, the 2 bright white orbs came together, and merged together, got much brighter, then went dark and disappeared.

i then went back to my home.
content.summary: large bright lime green rectangle came straight down and landed

content.detailedDescription: N9ooooo
content.summary: Triàngle flew over me añd my 2sons ,as big às a football field, silently, took pictures of orb,about 50 mph,no sound,àlso saw cigar shape one portholes disappeared. also sauser that disaapeared.Orb that chased us.Threw canyyn

content.detailedDescription: N9ooooo
content.summary: Triàngle flew over me añd my 2sons ,as big às a football field, silently, took pictures of orb,about 50 mph,no sound,àlso saw cigar shape one portholes disappeared. also sauser that disaapeared.Orb that chased us.Threw canyyn

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 7:04pm my father walked outside for just a few seconds when he saw in the distance, 5 unfamiliar lights pulsating in the pitch black sky. he ran inside to grab my mother; they saw 5 red/orange lights arranged similar to the dippers, one white blinking light hovered between them all. these red/orange lights, from our perspective, were round and large compared to all other star in the sky, but not as large as the moon. the bottom red/orange light faded away within seconds. the second light shortly followed. my mother ran inside to grab me. at 7:05pm i grabbed my phone and i walked outside to start taking pictures and videos. i saw three red/orange lights in the sky at different heights. the lights moved from north west to north east. the three lights pulsated a red/orange glow. the light closest to west pulsated and descended while fading out until it was no longer visible. then the next light closest to west raised, and lowered itself to be at the same height as the light closest to east. when the two remaining lights were lined up, the light farthest west faded and descended until it disappeared seconds later. the last remaining light shortly after also faded and descended until it disappeared. the white blinking light remained underneath all of the pulsating red/orange lights during the entire time of the event, while moving back and forth from west to east. my father, mother and i were all very shocked. we were freaking out, what we saw was unbelievable. my mother kept asking "did that just happen?". my father said that in all his life, out of the 15 years he has been going into our back yard every night, he has never seen anything like this. we are still astonished. these lights were not airplanes, helicopters or any other type of familiar aircrafts. they were unidentified flying objects. they disappeared in the sky one after another. these were no aircrafts; they were ufos.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 red/orange pulsating lights disappeared one by one in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving calgary at 5 in the afternoon and noticed a bright light as i neared the outskirts on the east-side of the city. as i continued east, the light did not deviate at all, which made me think that it could not be an airplane, as it did not do anything but get brighter and brighter. as i reached highway 1, i pulled over as the light continued to approach. i got out of my car, just as the light passed the highway, and saw what was behind it. it was a huge ship that was moving very slow as it came over the road. it stopped moving forward and then turned in my direction. it seemed to be at least 600 to 800 feet long. it passed over me, moving at about 5mph. the shape was very odd, as well. it was like a flat deck, with pontoon style on it's sides. there were octagon-like windows on the sides of the pontoon structures. these windows were bordered around with rivet-like bolts. i could see in the windows, but nothing appeared in them. all this time, there was no sound of engines or anything else coming from the craft. at no time, was the craft any higher then about 500 feet as it continued along. other cars had by now pulled over and people were outside of their cars, looking at this craft. the craft continued about a half mile from my position, then stopped, and turned again slowly and continued it's path to the west. even as it made it's way towards the city, people continued leaving their cars to look at it. it then approached the city of calgary and i lost sight of it. this craft was visible to me for approx. 20 minutes. i expected to read about it in the local newspapers in the next few days, but nothing was ever reported. i had to be at work in a local rural town, so i did not have the time to report it. the vision of the vehicle has never left my memory, and i can still see every part of it every time i close my eyes or even think of it. i know it has been 40 years, but i am hoping that maybe someone who was there might see this report and remember it as well as i do. i have never seen this shape listed in any peoples description before, but maybe someone else might recall this same shape.
content.summary: Bright light appeared in the direction i was traveling and did not move left or right. the craft became totally visible after that.

content.detailedDescription: Went out onto back porch to have a cigarette. looked up into sky due east, lots of cloud cover, no stars visible. saw red light, slighly larger than a star through the tree. the light pulsated but did not move in any direction or change size. it was framed by tree branches so that i was sure it was not moving.After about 2 minutes (i was halfway through my cigarette)the light just disappeared all at once. i checked the time when i came back inside, 11:21 p.M. i believe that it was below the peaks of the wasatch mountains from my point of view, but hard to say due to the darkness and cloud cover.
content.summary: Went out onto back porch to have a cigarette. looked up into sky due east, lots of cloud cover, no stars visible. saw red light, slighly larger than a star through the tree. the light pulsated but did not move in any direction or change size.

content.detailedDescription: To whom it may concern: this is marc frazier again the reason why i am contacting mufon is because on 12-26-15 and 12-28-15 those nights when i just laid down to go to sleep something out of the ordinary been happening to me twice the same exact experience. now as i'm trying to go to sleep this clear vivid vision takes over my mind set. mainly on the date 12-26-15 around 10:00pm! i just laid my head down and about 5 to 7 minutes in my rest state a clear vision took over where as i could not control what i was thinking. now what i'm about to tell is true to the best of my knowledge. this vision and not a dream was like i was looking out through something or somebody else's eyes. it looked like a screen or maybe a helmet i was looking outside of and it appeared that whom ever or what is was flying possible a vessel of some sort over a planet or a enormous rock. now the planet or rock had a reddish surface almost like the surface from the desert when the sun starts to go down during our summer months but more of a reddish color. the vision i was looking out of was flying just straight and below was hundreds of  thousands huge like insects creature mimicking spiders. now these insects or spiders creatures seemed to have six legs instead of eight legs like our spider species. the surface had a certain definitions and cracks in them that i can draw out if i could do it on my computer. the landscape also in the vision far ahead was a large like mountain almost like a volcano that erupted many years ago. i marc frazier open my eyes and the vision was still there i lifted my head up and tried looking around in my bedroom but i was still stuck in that vision all around me. i could not shake this what i was seeing! this seemed to have been going on for about 2 minutes and slowly faded away. but one thing for sure is that i was not dreaming this at all. i know the difference between a dream and what i seen on both of those days mainly on that monday(12-28-15). for the next few days i tried to go to sleep and think my way into the vision again if possible but i could not do it.I telling you this because the older i get the more things that i see clearly more than other people. but definitely those were huge like insects spider creatures their color was a darkish grey color they might have been the size of our elephants on this planet.
content.summary: Over whelming vision

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at work looking out the window overlooking gloucester. i saw what looked like over 50 stars just dancing around the sky moving very fast and in random directions. after trying to keep watching my eyes got very blurry and was seeing all just flashing lights  i took two pictures and a video. all of which you can see the lights that i was seeing. when youoom in on the pictures is when you really see more. i kept looking all day to try and see more but saw nothing.
content.summary: Dancing stars in moving very fast in random directions very bright then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Observed bright lights appearing 3 weeks ago on multiple night in a similar location.  eventually tried multiple binoculars and got best view last night.  appears circular with pulsing white and blue lights.  seems to appear similar to classic flying saucers.  at least 90k feet high based on comparison to commercial craft.  had been for last three weeks over the atlant ocean.  tonight appeared to travel se and picture taken when object over land, possibly above ft lauderdale, fl
content.summary: Multi week sightings of same ufo over multiple hours each night

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 2004 my wife and i lived on a rented farm about 5 miles se of marshfield, wi. we were outside in the late afternoon feeding horses and showing a horse to a couple who stopped by. it was a dark, cloudy day and it looked like we were going to get a storm. clouds were very low and dark. all four of us were standing next to the barn, my wife and the couple facing me, me facing them (south). i was asked a question and mid sentence, during my reply, i saw a large metallic object very slowly emerge from a low cloud behind the three people i was talking to. i stopped mid-sentence while all three of them stared at me as to say "well". my wife gave me the embarrassed "pay attention" look. it came about 1/2 way out of the cloud, then reversed direction and very slowly slipped right back in and was then hidden by the cloud.

i went back into where i left off with my sentence, then let them talk a minute or two while i digested what i had just seen. as soon as there was a short break in the conversation i told them that i had just seen a ufo, and of course, they all thought i was nuts. i don't think my wife thought i was a nut, but the couple that stopped by were not people i knew and they very much looked at me like i was crazy.

about 10 minutes later the conversation was still gong on, but this time my wife and the couple were the ones facing south, when all of a sudden all three of them said, there it is and pointed over my shoulder. by the time i turned around, it was already gone and had tucked back into the cloud. we all spent the next couple of minutes saying things like wow, that was weird and chuckling a bit. i am sure that since we did not all know each other, we all felt like keeping our thoughts to ourselves. i know my wife and i did. the couple left shortly after and my wife and i still talk about that day from time to time.

the ufo was disc shaped and looked to me a bit like brushed metal, no windows, doors, lights or anything other than a metallic disc. it made no noise, it moved very smoothly and deliberately. i used to work for an aerial photography company and i am always aware of elevation when i see something in the sky. this object could not have been more than 200 or 300 feet up and was very clearly visible to me. i knew instantly that this was not something ordinary.

it left me with a very eerie, nervous feeling that i was not just being watched, but that at least for those few minutes i was being watched in some weird way and on some kind of level that i do not ever recall feeling before. even now, after all these years, i can still remember that eerie feeling....A bit like feeling invaded and certainly a feeling of helplessness if they wanted to do something to me.

for the life of us, we cannot figure out who it was that stopped by to look at the horses that night. my wife clearly remembers seeing the ufo and remembers not only my reaction to seeing it, but the couple's reaction as well. she has absolutely no memory of what the actual ufo looked like though, which she finds strange and confusing.

to be honest, the idea of reporting a ufo never even crossed my mind. who would i ever report it to and why would i bother? the subject of our sighting came back up in conversation again last night and i decided that sometime this weekend i was going to go ahead and report it. this sighting really is a vivid memory for me even after all these years.
content.summary: Low flying ufo slowly emerged from cloud, then slowly reversed direction and went back in.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a truck driver for a production company in chicago. on the afternoon of december  11, 2015, i was traveling east on interstate 40 in the center lane just west of exit 145 in oklahoma city.  at approximately  2:15 pm cst.  i witnessed  a commercial  airliner taking off and traveling west.  it quickly  made a sharp 90 degree turn and headed south across the interstate.  during its accent and travel west i noticed a circular shaped black object flying directly above the main cabin.  
 as the airliner made its 90 degree turn the circular object stayed directly above the airliner.  the airliner was now traveling south and had leveled out at about 3000 feet.  during the entire time i witnessed the event the object was able to stay directly above the commercial jet.  passing behind the object i was able to determine  that the object was not connected to the airliner in any way.  the object was a perfect circle, dark black in color. 
i would estimate  the object  was 100 to 150 feet in diameter. the object was a perfect circle. the object did not have any markings or visible lines.  it was about 200 to 300 yards above the jet airliner the entire time. it continued south as i continued east on interstate 40. 

i feel this object was a craft of some kind. i'm very familiar with airplanes landing and taking off, as i'm a resident near ohare airport in chicago. 

frank losurdo
content.summary: Ufo  over  oklahoma  city

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard taking pictures of the night sky. i was trying different shutter and exposure settings for a good picture of the stars. about 15 minutes in, i check the photo i had just taken and saw a large, foreign object. so i took another from the same position and caught what i would guess to be the tail end. i took more pictures but did not see it anymore.  further analysis of the picture reveals very clear white and red lights on an object in the sky.
content.summary: Train-like ufo with red and white lights

content.detailedDescription:
A.Coming home from missoula mt i noticed a ball of fire flying over arlee, mt. the ball was there and gone.  i looked over to my girl friend to see of she saw the fireball when i noticed an airliner flying south towards missoula mt.  i did a double take when i noticed a shinny metallic disk flying directly under the plane.  i grabbed the steering wheel so my girl friend could look over and witness the ufo for herself.
b. waking up in the middle of the night around three am. i noticed my girlfriend standing outside looking at the night sky.  i walked out and started staring at this huge diamond glowing in the sky above us.  she told me it has followed her home from work.  after a short time we went into the house with the object still in the sky
c. have a photo of a being in my daughters room that is directly behind her in her room.  of course the being was not there when the photo was taken.  the being is a tall thin creature, with a head somewhat footballish, with big black eye's on the outside of head. the picture seems some what blurry or distorted on the bottom, but the main part is clear.
content.summary: Right after a ball of fire flew through the sky i looked west of arllee and say a airliner heading south to missoula with a craft flying right under it.  had my girlfriend look while i  grabbed the wheel.  the ball of fire was in the paper the next day,

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking our dog around 8:05 pm when we first observed a large bright red pulsating light silently flying the eastern sky over monroeville which was moving in a northeastern direction toward wilkinsburg.  a few seconds later another identical red pulsating light appeared in the eastern sky probably a mile behind the first red light.  the second red pulsating light suddenly sped up and moved very close to the first red pulsating light and then stopped.  the two red lights  hovered together probably 100 feet apart. all of a sudden a third identical red pulsating light appeared about a mile behind them in the east and quickly flew toward the others. when the third red pulsating light was about a 600 feet away from the first two hovering red lights, it abruptly stopped and began to hover. the first light suddenly blinked out, then the second light blinked out, and finally the third light blinked out. helicopters regularly fly over our house on the way to pittsburgh hospitals, but these lights did not appear, sound or move the same way as helicopters. the objects were silent, each had only one large red pulsating light and no other lights, and they were able to stop abruptly and hover, and then blink out. the whole event lasted about 5-7 minutes.
content.summary: Three silent pulsating red objects that flew east to northeast, hovered and blinked out

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my balcony to have a cigarette while talking to a friend on the phone, i observed this glowing orb moving in a way a plane or airplane could travel. it went behind ridges and in front of them. it hovered and moved, when it moved quickly you would see the colour change on the opposing side. i tried to use my phone to capture pictures but was unable to focus on the object, i did get a short video of the object before it winked out of existence. i was unable to focus on this object and attempted several videos, but my 41mp camera could not focus on it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moving orb of light, solid greenish/blue colouring and when it moved quickly, ornage/redish on opposite side of movement

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were walking along the water in the old jan juan area in puerto rico. my wife had a high resolution nikon camera and was taking photos of the sea and sky. she took 4-7 photos in quick succession. right after she took these photos she began looking at them and we saw in one photo the beginning of this white orb/foo fighter starting to form, the very next photo had a very high quality and bright orb in it. another photo we took a few minutes later shows a white orb as well, but in a different position. but the file 3 picture i uploaded is the best orb photo we took.

whats interesting is that we did not see anything with our eyes, only once we looked onto the screen of the camera did we see this orb. what could that mean? could this have been inter dimensional and that why our eyes could not see it but the camera picked it up? she took the photos very quickly, so it moved in the sky very fast, it was seen in the first 2 photos and by the third its gone.

this photo was taken after sunset and there was nothing flying in the sky at this moment. and again we didn't see this with our eyes, only once we looked at the camera screen.
content.summary: Circular white orb/foo fighter seen after sunset

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 1630 i was driving home from work. i looked up to see this planet-size very bright white "orb" in the day sky. the sun was east in the sky and as seen by the photos, this object is not characteristic of the moon. i sat in my car taking various photos...This object never moved - only hovered. i drove home and uploaded the pics to facebook. a few months later i grew curious as to what i saw so i googled ufo sightings july 29,2015 - to my surprise there was sightings in japan and honolulu during this same date. i would like to know what i saw. thanks in advance guys!
content.summary: Please see below

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from seattle to tacoma. there are lots of planes. i looked up and saw what i thought was a plane light materialize in the horizon. it then took a swift descent at about 45 degrees towards the ground. it lasted about 5 to 7 seconds and then it just disappeared. i have seen meteors, space debris, satellites, planes, etc. but this was in the same air space as another plane that was flying a couple miles to the east of it. my passenger looked up at the last second and thought he saw a red tail on it. i saw it from beginning to end but did not see the red tail. we both agreed that it was in the air space and the downward descent was something we have never seen. it wasn't fast enough for a meteor, and it had no colors or streaks for space debris. i am making this report in case someone else has had an experience.
content.summary: A light that looked like any airplane materialized and then took a 45 degree descent down

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i were home in south austin, tx. it was new years eve and we had recently seen what we were pretty sure was a drone. watching the night sky for fireworks and hoping for another glimpse of the drone. i heard a humming. thinking it was the return on the drone we started looking. then from the north moving in a straight line we saw something not making a sound but moving across the night sky. at first i thought it was a burning piece of debris from a firework. but it kept rising and moving further and further away until it had moved either out of sight or into the clouds. then when it had disappeared anther came into sight from the same direction as the last on had originated. then i ran inside and my wife called out because another had started to go across the sky and then 2 more at shorter intervals. i'm still not sure it wasn't a weird flare orfirework. but it was definitely something i nor my my wife had ever seen.
content.summary: Saw a drone before them but it was different. first saw one then i believe 3 or 4 more. witnessed by both me and my wife. not sure if ufo or something rider

content.detailedDescription:
Outside on back porch 
noticed a red glowing sphere 50-60 feet away hovering off ground 
object sphere thought it was fireworks 
noticed sphere glowing very red 50-60 feet away ,as i watched this sphere it slowly backed away from me climing in hight to about 40 feet above pine tree line , hovering then slowly moving to my right . then stopped and hovering  again , then leaped a huge distance in less then a blink . then hovering again then turning back towards me making a flight path of a sideways "l" , then change colors to orange and very brilliant white and shot straight up lighting up the clouds before disappearing.
amazing and helpless to get cellphone to get pictures which i felt mentally. i always have my cellphone with me . i came back inside and was very quiet . 
not drunk begin new year's eve .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red sphere hovering then backed away climing to tree level hovering flight path " l " shape turned orange and shape change then shot straight up lighting up clouds as it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep when my grandmother visiting at the time awoke me to say there is to moons outside i got up and look to see what it was i saw it through one window but i thought it was just the glair so i whent  to another window and still saw it after about 30 seconds it decended and moved towards me then acceded above my house i rushed to the other side of my house there was a blue flash but then it was gone the ufo was silver with about 8 bright white lights on the botome i was both interested and terrified
content.summary: It was hovering then after about 30 sec it decented and came to words me then ascended above my house i ran to the other side of my house to se if it was there but it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
In the fall of 2011 or so me and a friend was out lounging on the deck, just looking up into the sky... enjoying the day. it was probably around 3 or 4pm est, sunny... but puffy clouds of different shapes and elevation. when i noticed this object, really far up... dipping below and above the cloud. it was so far up, but we both watched this object for about 2 minutes or so... before it rose above the cloud and didn't appear again. because of the elevation of this item, it was difficult to make out much detail at all. but after talking with my friend about the object, we decided it was triangle shaped.. and had possible lights of the orange spectrum (could of been just reflecting sunlight)... we couldn't make out the location of the lights on the object. but what caught our attention was the ability of this object to stay at the location in the sky and only rising and dropping above the cloud line in a stationary position. (though it is possible the cloud itself was what was making the object seem to rise and fall)and it just stayed stationary. the most astonishing thing is, you could tell it was metallic because of the reflection from the sun, a silver like color. i have ruled out satellites or known man made craft, just because of it's ability to hold it's position for a couple of minutes in the sky before rising above and out of sight. i live in a very rural area, where i can barely see my neighbors house in the distance.
also something that may be of interest,  hours away from my location is a base....  and often we have f-16's flying over head...  sometimes several at a time.  the ufo we seen stationary at the cloud line, and was much higher than the f-16's training flight path.
content.summary: Metallic triangle shaped craft hovers at cloud line for several minutes before ascending above the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
New years eve 12-31-2015 1:11pm, eugene, or.
  i was looking out our front window that faces west, as i often do for occasions such as this rare one.  there is eug airport to the north and to the west of our location and an area called the 'wetlands' almost due west also from our location.  the wetlands are a preserved site critical for bird migration in this area, so there is always something to look for and see, and that is what i do when i look to the west.
  i saw birds and watched closely and i could see the white tail feathers and head of something.  i was not sure what kind of large bird i was observing, but i called my wife to have a look, as she too is very interested in large birds.  as she, my wife, came to the window, i went for my dslr camera, and by the time i came back, she was outside watching what was an eagle coming towards us from the west and passed over near by and flew away in a southerly direction.  i commented, that if there is one, then there is another one, and speculated that we may see more later on.  that was at 10:25am according to the digital photo time stamp of captured images of that first single eagle sighting.
  at 1:11pm later that same day, my wife was outside in the back patio when she called for me and bring the camera.  she had spotted two eagles approaching from the west as she looked over the roof of the house to the west.  i managed to capture several images of the pair of eagles as they flew towards us and again headed off in a southerly direction unknown due to being in the back of the house as the large birds were still further to the west from our location.
  after watching the pair of eagles fly out of sight, we went back to what we had been doing before the activity with the eagle sightings.
  i later that same day looked at the images i had captured with a dslr camera (nikon d3000), and looked closely at each photograph and noticed something in one of the frames.
  an object, that appears to be oval in shape and white in color, with the possibility of a shadow, shows up in image dsc_3614 that depicts a pair of large birds in flight facing away from the camera.  one large bird on the left of the frame appears to be to the upper left of the frame and the second large bird appears to be to the lower right of the frame.
  the 'object' in question, is to the upper right of the left large bird in the frame.
content.summary: New years eve eagle sightings 1:11pm.  second of two sightings.  first eagle sighting was a solo eagle.  the second sighting was a pair of eagles.  an 'object' shows up in a digital photograph of the pair of eagle sighting

content.detailedDescription: I came  home about 3:00 am just got out of my car i notice 3 yellow and green  flames moving over my head abot 300 or 500 ft was moving like  20 0r 30 miles no noise and no heat funny thing front of the flames there was no object. watched about 3 to 4 min  just keep going same speed same direction and i lost it becouse of trees.
content.summary: Don't know if it was ufo

content.detailedDescription:
It was a very nice clear, calm beautiful summer morning,  i work at a major railroad in the core of the city as usual you can hear all the traffic from the city sirens, traffic in general trains ect. off to the south east i could see what appeared to be a hot air balloon which is quite common during the summer months at this time of the morning. i looked away for what i thought was about a moment looked again and this object i thought was a balloon with so much closer whiched seems impossible as there was not much wind that day  and this got my attention the next thing i know i'm aware of all noise surrounding me went away in a very eerie dead calm & am now looking at this object just ahead & above me, so immense and distinctive i'm standing in awe! i had no feeling of being scared i'm just standing there stunned  looking at what can not be and the lack of any sound, not just from the object but any noise,  it's like i'm the only one in the world watching this, that part disturbs till this day as many people should have also seen!
 as for its description it was round in shape but definitely not smooth that had vertical huge panels which tapered off to a smaller  transition on both top and bottom, it did not move just hung in the air stationary. i remember thinking that a 747 would look like a kid's toy next to it in fact could very easily land on top of it. as i'm standing there dumbstruck and wondering where is everybody  else is , others should  be seeing this and when i turned away hoping others are witnessing  this, that is when it was  gone & all noise of the day returned. 
 i have had a number of sightings of ufos over the years since the age of about 13 but nothing like this, did time stand still or was i in another dimension- don't  know.  i do however understand people who do not want to come forward, i have told just close family  and been so ridiculed "oh yes randy your the choosen one ha ha" or a girlfriend  who says she will leave  if  i continue,  btw i am now 56 yrs old.
 again  please  do not release or publish my name whatsoever !
content.summary: Extremely large around but not smooth very distinct panels could be seen clearly

content.detailedDescription: Was traveling home from working in field combining barley.  saw a light in review mirror and saw light behind me.  no other vehicles in area and was at night around midnight.  i was 17 years old at time.  looked up in my windscreen and saw a disc shaped ufo fly over my vehicle. it was very clear and not very high, about 50 feet above me.   i was close to my farm yard and it stopped hovering over our field.  i could see it while i drove into the farm yard as it had just stopped and just hovered there.  i parked and went into our house and woke my dad and mom.  i asked if they wanted to see something strange as i was not really familiar with what it was.  my dad came out on the porch and we looked at it for awhile.  i went and got my binoculars and looked at this object.  it was very clear in the binoculars and was discredited shaped with a rim separating the top and bottom parts.  the top part had portholes spaced around it and looked larger than the bottom part.  a band separating these was slowly spinning going clockwise and you could see this motion very clearly.  after about 5 minutes it slowly started moving toward the east.  i asked dad should we follow it so we got in my car and started following it.  after about 5 miles it climbed higher about three times the height it had been.  it started to spin very fast in place until it just looked like a blinking light.  suddenly it sped off out of site leaving a red light like when you move a glow stick very fast.  the light it left was in a soft circle and it looked like it went very high or out of the atmosphere.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change

content.detailedDescription: Size, how close it was,how long it stayed,how fast it left,a ufo no doute.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving on road in populated area stopped my truck object came from left front over a hillside  got out fo truck stode came lower and closer hovering i watched for a few minuets then it moved to my right down a cross street and was gone at a very hig

content.detailedDescription: I was living in edmonton. in the city. it was a july afternoon around 4:30p.  i was sitting on the stoop of my doorstep. i was reading the internet on my smart phone. i just happened to look up and noticed a solid flat black triangle craft just "gliding" across the sky just over the tree top to my neighbor's house. it was about 4/5 story's high. it just slowly and specifically silently, moved/glided through the air in a straight line. i was sittding off to the left of it, but practically underneath it.  i never saw lights. i think due to the fact it was a beautiful sunny sumner day. no clouds. the left side had a scalped edge (like a steak knife and a straight edge on the right). i am partially disabled and need a cane to walk, so i couldn't get up quickly enough to walk past the tree tops to continue to view it. and of course even with a cell phone in my hand, it was on the internet news and i wouldn't have been able to click over to camera quick enough to take a photo. this sighting was extremely brief. but i saw what i saw and have tried to make sense of it since. thank you. suzi
content.summary: Black triangle. scalped edge. afternoon. no lights. silently glided overhead then gone.

content.detailedDescription:
On january 1st 2016, between 11:00-11:15am in cary, nc.

i was outside at a park with decent elevation and watched two solid black air craft fly as a lose pair next to each other, but switching sides once, silent and no trail across the entire sky at high altitude.

the shape seems most often like a triangle, but could have easily been boomerang, disc, or chevron shape also.

it was last morning, so i could not see any lights of any kind being used, or that could be noticed from the distance i was observing.

these could have been military planes, but seemed notably different since they left no visible trail and produced no sound during the entire observation.

they also seemed to move very fast for no sound or trail, crossing from low ne horizon up over the center of my sky and down again into the sw horizon.  the whole viewing took only 3-4 minutes at most.

the two craft seemed solid black and very small in size, but may have simply been at very high altitude.

so, these could have simply been regular old military aircraft, but i coulnd't identify for sure from where i was standing.

unfortunately, i did not have any method to record or take pictures, but i will be watching the skyes more often now.
content.summary: January two solid black air craft flew as a lose pair next to each other, but switching sides once, silent and no trail across the entire sky at high altitude.  these could have been military planes, but seemed notably different.
